asparagus.name: Asparagus
asparagus.description: Tender and delicious. Try on the grill for even more flavor.

broccoli.name: Broccoli
broccoli.description: Incredibly fresh and tasty. Makes the perfect pizza topping!

carrot.name: Carrot
carrot.description: Perfect amount of sweet and crunchy. Great for dipping in peanut butter.

kale.name: Kale
kale.description: Spice up your salad with this tasty green. Also good as a stir fry ingredient.

lettuce.name: Lettuce
lettuce.description: Basic iceberg lettuce to create a basic salad.

pepper.name: Pepper
pepper.description: Add a little kick to your meal! Terrific bell pepper.
